synopsis.text: After a series of vivid dreams, the unassuming Ogata finds himself in a complex dance of love and seduction with his friend, Takasugi. Both men harbor deep feelings for one another, but their shared desire for dominance in the relationship presents a unique challenge. Ogata, a dedicated salaryman, must navigate this uncharted territory, determined to win Takasugi's heart without compromising his own desires. As they embark on a romantic getaway, the stakes are raised, and the game of love becomes even more intriguing. Will their shared passion bring them closer, or will their stubbornness drive them apart? Join Ogata and Takasugi on their comedic and heartwarming journey of self-discovery and love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
